name: License for group child care home, group child care center required
text:
B.  Group Child Care Home and Group Child
Care Center Licensure
     No person shall operate, maintain, or conduct a group child care home or group child care center unless licensed to do so by the department of human services under this subpart. [L 1985, c 208, pt of §2; am L 1987, c 339, §4]
